trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown when one of the arguments provided to a method is not valid.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the error message and the parameter name, or only the error message if no parameter name is set.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A text string describing the details of the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The value of this property takes one of two forms:

Condition

Value

The paramName is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) or of zero length.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxx xxxxx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxxx $$x$$x$x$Xxxxx $$x$$x$xxxxx$$xxxxx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ xx xx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n\n

The message string passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n\n

The paramName is not null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) and it has a length greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ xxx xx xxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n\n

The message string appended with the name of the invalid parameter.
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$xx$$x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: \n\n
trans-unit.target: $$x$$x$$xx$$$xx$$$xxxxx$$$xxxxx$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the parameter that causes this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The parameter name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x
